title: Spacious Renovated 3BR, 2BA Condo, Modern Kitchen, Hdwd Flrs, W-D, Pkg
posting_body: ['Available September 1st.', ' Great 3 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom Apartment located in East Arlington near Davis Square & the Redline, Arlington Square, Tufts University and easy access to get into Cambridge, Somerville and Boston !', 'Please Text or Call Craig Scanzio at 617-758-9763 and reference ID #80a-303330111 to setup a showing.', 'When you respond, please leave your full name and the best phone number to call or text you back!', 'PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 80a-303330111', 'Rent: $3,600 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Beautiful  3 Bedroom  Condo in two family home in East Arlington !', 'Spacious open concept living/dining room on 1st floor with office alcove.', '2 Level Unit on 1st and 2nd Floors !', 'o 1.4 miles from Davis Square Redline & Buses', 'o Living Room, Dining Room, Kitchen & Rear Balcony are on 1st Floor', 'o Gorgeous Modern Kitchen - Granite counter tops, Stainless Appliances.', 'Gas Range, Microwave, Dishwasher & Beautiful Cabinets!', 'o Master Bedroom &(2) Bathrooms also on 1st Level; Master Bath has jetted tub!', 'o Spacious bedrooms with generous closet space.', 'o Apartment features Central Air Conditioning', 'o Nice Office Alcove on 1st floor for working from home', 'o Large shared Patio in Back Yard.', 'o Off street Parking on left side of  driveway with one Garage spot.', 'o Tenants pay all Utilities:  Gas, Electric and Water!', 'o Great  location:  Close to Bus Line to get around Arlington, close to theater and fabulous restaurants.', 'o Easy bus ride  to Davis Square/Redline T and great access to get into Boston!', 'Deposits of 1st Month, Security Deposit & Brokers’ Fee requested along with Good Credit and References with application!', 'FEATURES', 'A/C', 'Alcove', 'Central Air', 'Ceramic Tiles', 'Deck', 'Decorative Lighting', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Double Floor Apartment Unit', 'Driveway parking', 'Garage', 'Garage Parking', 'Gas Stove', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Large Closets', 'Laundry in Basement', 'Microwave', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'Park', 'Parking', 'Patio', 'Professionally Managed', 'Spacious', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Storage in Basement', 'Sunny!', 'Wine Storage', 'Yard', 'Pricing & availability subject to change.', 'The advertised price & availability must be confirmed at the time of showing.']
